overview: A donkey has grown old and weak after having worked for [a] human being for a long time.  Realizing his prime time has passed, the donkey decides to go to Bremen to join the town musicians.  On the way there, he meets a dog, a cat, and a rooster, and they find the robbers’ house.  Four animals scare the robbers away from the house.  They make their new lives with their new home.
title: The Town Musicians of Bremen
